quizz_info_1: Remember the scene in Pulp Fiction where Vincent Vega shot Mia Wallace with a syringe and a LONG needle after her heroin overdose? Well he gave her a shot of adrenaline, also known as epinephrine. It is released naturally by our two adrenal glands and is known to increase heart rate. Fun thing is: you donâ€™t have to control it. It kicks in when it figures you could use some.
quizz_info_2: For more details on the synthesis and the titanium catalyst used, see: Tetrahedron Lett. 1997, 38, 927-930. For more details about the Hofmann rearrangement using PhI(OAc)2, see: J. Org. Chem. 1993, 58, 2478-2482. For more information about adrenaline science, see:  https://youtu.be/GilWRuk81tk

cards.condition: 1) SOCl2, then NH4OH; 2) PhI(OAc)2, KOH; 3) LiAlH4, THF, reflux
